issue.title: [R] Add deprecation cycle for pull() change

### Original Issue Description:
A revdep check broke because of ARROW-17439. We can work around by making the new behavior opt-in in this release and switch it in a future release, as was suggested (and brushed off by me, sorry) in code review.
